result.ga: Bhí sé ag cuimilt a dhá shúil
result.orig: Bhí sé ag cuimilt a dhá shúil
result.html: Bhí sé ag cuimilt a dhá shúilHe was rubbing his eyes.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ag cuimilt a ḋá ẛúilHe was rubbing his eyes.

result.html: Las a súileHer eyes lit up.
result.ponchtml: Las a súileHer eyes lit up.

result.html: Tháinig uisce lena súileHer eyes started running.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig uisce lena súileHer eyes started running.

result.ga: Cuireann sé uisce le mo shúile
result.orig: Cuireann sé uisce le mo shúile
result.html: Cuireann sé uisce le mo shúileIt makes my eyes run.
result.ponchtml: Cuireann sé uisce le mo ẛúileIt makes my eyes run.

result.eng: There were dark hollows underneath his eyes.
result.html: Bhí loig dhorcha faoina shúileThere were dark hollows underneath his eyes.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí loig ḋorċa faoina ẛúileThere were dark hollows underneath his eyes.

result.ga: Bhí na súile ag drud ar Shéimí
result.orig: Bhí na súile ag drud ar Shéimí
result.html: Bhí na súile ag drud ar ShéimíJamie's eyes were closing.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí na súile ag drud ar ṠéimíJamie's eyes were closing.

result.eng: He eyes were closing with sleep.
result.ga: Bhí na súile ag drud uirthi leis an chodladh
result.orig: Bhí na súile ag drud uirthi leis an chodladh
result.html: Bhí na súile ag drud uirthi leis an chodladhHe eyes were closing with sleep.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí na súile ag drud uirṫi leis an ċodlaḋHe eyes were closing with sleep.

result.eng: Her eyes were red from how much she had been crying.
result.ga: Bhí a dhá shúil dearg ar mhéad is a bhí caointe aici
result.orig: Bhí a dhá shúil dearg ar mhéad is a bhí caointe aici
result.html: Bhí a dhá shúil dearg ar mhéad is a bhí caointe aiciHer eyes were red from how much she had been crying.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a ḋá ẛúil dearg ar ṁéad is a ḃí caointe aiciHer eyes were red from how much she had been crying.

result.eng: They will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
result.ga: Ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile é
result.orig: Ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile é
result.html: Ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile éThey will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
result.ponchtml: Ní ċreidfiḋ siad a ḋaṫ mura moṫaí siad lena láṁa é agus mura ḃfeice siad lena súile éThey will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.

result.html: Tháinig na deora leisTears came into his eyes.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig na deora leisTears came into his eyes.
